name: radioactivity_concentration_of_132I_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "I" means the element "iodine" and "132I" is the isotope "iodine-132" with a half-life of 9.60e-02 days.
